ygData.subject: zone summary (was :Places to for a low level..)
ygData.msgSnippet: I just get too bored staying in the same zone for so many levels. Here is my breakdown to level 20: 1-5 greater faydark 6-8 greater faydark (orc
ygData.messageBody:
I just get too bored staying in the same zone for so many levels.
Here is my breakdown to level 20:

1-5 greater faydark
6-8 greater faydark (orc camps)/crushbone
9-10 misty thicket
11-13 chessboard in butcherblock (with some in unrest and steamfont)
13-14 west commons, misty thicket
14-16 scarecrows in west karana
16-17 oasis, everfrost. splitpaw
19-20 Cazic Thule, Oasis (solo)
20 Unrest
I plan to stay in Unrest until I get a BS tunic (got a savant's cap
today). Then it's off to Mistmoore, or maybe upper guk.


>From: "Cliff, Monty" <mcliff@...>
>
> Here is a rough summary of where I got most of my experience on my
> quest to get 50.
>
> I started as a halfling cleric.
>
> Level Zone
>
> 0-12 Misty thicket
> 12-16 Beholder Maze
> 16-21 Oasis
> 21-25 Unrest
> 25-29 S.Karana/Lake Rathe
> 29-34 Mistmoor
> 34-47 Solusk B
> 47-50 Specters in Oasis/Ocean of Tears, Tiny Miller in W.Karana
> 50 L.Guk/Hate/Fear
>
> After Misty thicket I hardly soloed at all until I hit 47 then pretty
> much soloed to 50. Tiny Miller is great exp if you don't mind being
> hated in Qeynos and the Karanas (j boots are strongly recommended).
> You can also buff the young clerics doing scarecrows while fighting
> Tiny :) .
> I was also always broke until I started fighting in Mistmoor then the
> steady income started coming in.
>
> Drogo DarkBane
> The Rathe
